pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pure Python FNV hash implementation===================================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/znerol/py-fnvhash.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/znerol/py-fnvhashPure Python implementation of the FNV_ hash family with 100% test coverage.Take a look at pyhash_ for use cases where performance is more important thanportability... _FNV: http://isthe.com/chongo/tech/comp/fnv/.. _pyhash: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyhashUsage-----:: >>> from fnvhash import fnv1a_32 >>> hex(fnv1a_32(b'foo')) '0xa9f37ed7'License-------The software is subject to the MIT license.
